Klasse EditController

java.lang.Object
controllers.EditController
public class EditController extends Object
Controller class responsible for editing user account credentials. Handles username and password change requests.

    • EditController

      public EditController() throws Exception
      Constructor that connects to the RMI registry and retrieves required server stubs.
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI registry connection fails
      NotBoundException - if any of the servers are not found in the registry
      Exception
